## HttpHandler interface

A function for making an HTTP requests to OpenSearchDashboards's backend. See [HttpFetchOptions](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.httpfetchoptions.md) for options and [HttpResponse](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.httpresponse.md) for the response.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HttpHandler 
```
